what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal bbsTaiwan streamline Taiwan Breeding Birds Survey (BBS) data retrieval analysis. support data retrieval GBIF, Taiwan BBS data stored. â€˜bbsTrimâ€™ also include population trend modelling. Users can tailor species analysis, controlling data stratification, preparation, modeling. goal expand Taiwan BBS data access broader R-society Taiwan.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install load development version bbsTaiwan GitHub :

what: If you need raw Taiwan BBS dataset on GBIF:
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Taiwan BBS raw data can accessed directly typing object name: complete Taiwan BBS dataset GBIF following Darwin Core Archive (DwC - ) format: Occurrence: lists set times locations particular species recorded Event: lists includes protocols used, sample size, location Measurement Facts: includes additional information relating events Extended Measurement Fact: includes additional information relating taxon occurrences

what: bbsTaiwan also provide a workflow to process Taiwan BBS data:
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic example shows use package: Check distribution BBS sites number sites surveyed throughout years:  Look scientific name species interest Fetch data species interest. need dataset across species, leave argument target_species NULL. output bbs_fetch list two elements: occurrence site_info. occurrence tibble, showing observations target species within selected year range second element site_info tibble including BBS sites: function bbs_fetch can also take multiple species time: View distribution occurrence target species within selected year range  Get basic summary statistics fetched data

what: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
text: function fetches occurrence data specified target species, utilizing event occurrence tables GBIF. fetched dataset undergoes following processing steps compared raw dataset: Retains observations specified target species. Converts implicit missing values explicit ones (e.g., filling zeros trips target species observed). Specifically, site/plot visited specific year/trip, without observing target species, dataset value 0 row.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
text: target_species Character string specifying scientific name species interest. can accept single character string, target_species = "Hypsipetes leucocephalus", vector, target_species = c("Hypsipetes leucocephalus", "Heterophasia auricularis"). Leave undefined use NULL return species. Use bbs_translate function help find species' scientific names.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
text: tibble containing species occurrence data.

title: Fetch BBS Occurrence Data by Species â€” bbs_fetch
code: bbs_fetch(target_species = c("Pycnonotus taivanus", "Pycnonotus sinensis")) #> # A tibble: 92,475 Ã— 16 #>     year month   day site   locationID decimalLatitude decimalLongitude weather #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr>                <dbl>            <dbl> <chr>   #>  1  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  2  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  3  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  6  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  7  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_01             25.1             122. NA      #>  8  2009     4    26 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #>  9  2009     3    10 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. NA      #> 10  2009     4     5 A02-01 A02-01_02             25.1             122. what: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history
title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history
text: function returns number sites surveyed year BBS Taiwan project. Sites mapped five regions: East, West, South, North, Mountain (elevation higher 1,000 m).

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history
Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history
text: type Character string specifying output format: either "table" "plot". Default value type = "plot"

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history
text: tibble ggplot showing number sites surveyed year across regions.

title: Examine the Number of BBS Sites Surveyed Each Year â€” bbs_history

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites â€” bbs_plotmap
text: function visualizes sites surveyed breeding birds Taiwan, highlighting presence absence specific species. designed upon function bbs_fetch.

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites â€” bbs_plotmap
Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites â€” bbs_plotmap
text: target_species Character string specifying scientific name species interest. can accept single character string, target_species = "Hypsipetes leucocephalus", vector, target_species = c("Hypsipetes leucocephalus", "Heterophasia auricularis"). Leave undefined use NULL return species. Use bbs_translate function help find species' scientific names.

title: Visualize Species Distribution Across All BBS Sites â€” bbs_plotmap

what: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites
title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites
text: function returns coordinates BBS sites surveyed. arguments needed. coordinates reported using WGS84 projection system. Use terra::vect(geom = c("decimalLatitude", "decimalLongitude"), crs = "epsg:4326") transform table spatial object.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites
Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites
text: tibble including coordinates BBS survey sites, WGS84.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites
text: source data comes event table GBIF dataset.

title: Return the Coordinates of All BBS Sites â€” bbs_sites

what: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name â€” bbs_translate
title: Translate Bird Species' Chinese Common Name to Scientific Name â€” bbs_translate
text: function intended use bbs_fetch function, requires target_species argument scientific names. function helps users find scientific names birds Chinese common names species found Taiwan.

text: target_species single character string vector character strings representing species' names Chinese.

text: vector bird species' scientific names. input species name included bird list Taiwan, "bird BBS list" returned. Please check typos.
